reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 221/07: COMMUNITY IMPROVEMENT PLANS - PRESCRIBED UPPER-TIER MUNICIPALITIES
reg_info.reg_name_text: community improvement plans — prescribed upper-tier municipalities
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 221/07: COMMUNITY IMPROVEMENT PLANS - PRESCRIBED UPPER-TIER MUNICIPALITIES

content.content: 1. The following upper-tier municipalities are prescribed for the purpose of subsection 28 (2) of the Act: 1. County of Frontenac. 2. District Municipality of Muskoka. 3. Regional Municipality of Durham. 4. Regional Municipality of Halton. 5. Regional Municipality of Niagara. 6. Regional Municipality of Peel. 7. Regional Municipality of Waterloo. 8. Regional Municipality of York. O. Reg. 221/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 15/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 246/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 451/16, s. 1; O. Reg. 76/18, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following upper-tier municipalities are prescribed for the purpose of subsection 28 (2) of the Act:

1. County of Frontenac.

2. District Municipality of Muskoka.

3. Regional Municipality of Durham.

4. Regional Municipality of Halton.

5. Regional Municipality of Niagara.

6. Regional Municipality of Peel.

7. Regional Municipality of Waterloo.

8. Regional Municipality of York. O. Reg. 221/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 15/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 246/08, s. 1; O. Reg. 451/16, s. 1; O. Reg. 76/18, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 221/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 221/07, s. 2.
